resources.string: PinballMap.com contains over 80 distinct regional pinball maps. Find yours, and help keep it up to date!

PinballMap.com
		Scott Wainstock
		Ryan Gratzer
		Brian Dols

	Artwork
		Drew Marshall

	Special Thanks
		Cleo, Sassy, Solomon,
		Bawb, and Brian Hanifin
Enter the machine name, or select it from the list
Click the box below to enter a machine description
Submit a Location to the Map
Send a message to your region\'s admin!

When requesting a new map for your area, please describe WHY one should be added. Does your region have an active pinball scene? Leagues? How many locations have pinball machines? Are you keeping track of them already? Would you be willing to act as the regional administrator, to help curate your map\'s data? The more details you give us, the better your request sounds!
machine notes blkasl asdlk jasdlk sd sdlsdk sjskj fksdj skdfsd
Confirm location is up to date
SIGN UP and help keep your map up to date! THANKS!
Login to leave a condition report
Login to add your high score

Since 2007, we\'ve spent countless evenings and weekends building, maintaining, and enhancing Pinball Map. We\'re grateful that so many people find it useful.

But as the site has grown in popularity and scope, the infrastructure costs have also grown. To help us defray these costs, we\'re asking for donations. We\'ve never made money off of this site, and we want it to remain ad-free.

Here are the costs, and thus our donation goals:

$110/year - Dreamhost; $20/year - Domain; $192/year - Database + SSL Encryption; $100/year - Apple Developer Fee

GRAND TOTAL: $422

If you like Pinball Map and want to help support it, you have our heartfelt thanks! - Scott and Ryan
